forum.content:
Hey there I am Vin I am looking for a language partner. I am a good conversationalist. I have been losing my English since I got back from USA. I had to pick my English. Just feel free to talk with me on BeeTalk or Line. I am used to talk with ppl on LINE.
I will reply your message as soon as possible!
forum.title: Looking for a language partner who wants improve oral speaking.
